name: Subscription + Cleanin' Kit - UK
description: To celebrate the arrival of Disegno No. 5 we are offering new subscribers AM's Cleanin' Kit for laptops and smartphones along with an annual subscription. Sign up for a two-issue subscription for only £25 (value £30) and get the Cleanin' Kit included free of charge (value £24). Please remember to provide us with details of which issue you want to start your subscription with and also leave us your telephone number in the notes section on PayPal for shipping purposes.

name: Disegno No. 5 - UK delivery FREE
description: Order the fifth issue of Disegno online. Disegno No.5 contains a reflection on the graphic identity of Marseille's year as European Capital Culture in our Exposé section, while there are longer pieces on projects including Hella Jongerius' redesign of the UN North Delegates Lounge in New York, a critical look at the future of lighting design, a photo-essay on the architectural significance of the Kumbh Mela religious pilgrimage, an exploration of everyday objects in a quiz designed by Sir Paul Smith, and a conversation between fashion designer Mary Katrantzou and photographer Erik Madigan Heck. Our Forecast section focuses on design studio Vitamins' Lego calendar and footwear designer Marloes ten Bhömer reinvention of the high heel. Don't miss out on the latest issue of Disegno.

name: 5-year Subscription - UK
description:
Disegno is offering libraries, institutions and professional subscribers an exclusive 5-year subscription, covering 10 issues of the biannual printed magazine, as well as PDF versions of all back-issues.

5-year subscription = 10 issues of Disegno = £150 (excluding postage)*

Disegno is an important resource for students, academics and practitioners alike. Launched in 2011, it has quickly established itself as an authoritative source of insightful and engaging journalism on international design, architecture and fashion. To date, five issues of Disegno has been published, the latest being the autumn/winter 2013 edition. We are currently working on issue 6, which will launch in March 2014.

Our 5-year subscription offer is flexible. For example, if your library does not currently stock any issues of Disegno, we can send you our five back issues and continue your subscription for the coming five. Regardless of which issue you start on, we will send you PDFs of all back issues – a great research tool as it's a searchable document.

Please specify your requirements in the ‘Notes’ field on the order form.

name: Behind the Scenes
description: Hanna Nova Beatrice's gripping account of the machinations behind the design industry. Featuring essays, roundtables and criticism, the book includes contributions from critics and designers such as Joseph Grima, Yves Béhar, Luca Nichetto and Disegno's Johanna Agerman Ross

name: Disegno No. 4 - UK delivery FREE
description: Order the fourth issue of Disegno online from 5 April with free delivery in the UK. Disegno No.4 contains a critical look at design and manufacturing company Established & Sons in our Exposé section while there are longer pieces on architectural projects like the Parrish Art Museum by Herzog & de Meuron and on fashion designers like Hedi Slimane for Yves Saint Laurent in our Features section alongside glimpses into the future with our Forecast section that focuses on game-developer Mojang’s Block by Block initiative and solutions generated by design problem-solvers Fixperts. This issue is not one to be missed.

name: Disegno No.3 - UK delivery FREE
description: The third issue of Disegno arrives 18 October. Be the first to get your hands on a copy by ordering it online. This nugget of an issue includes features on Nobel price laureate Orhan Pamuk's Museum of Innocence in Istanbul, Dutch fashion designer Maria Blaisse, interviews with Olafur Eliasson, Eley Kishimoto, Charles Pollock, Shigeru Ban and much, much more. And delivery to the UK is now free!

name: Disegno No.2 - UK delivery FREE
description: Disegno is a biannual magazine covering architecture, design and fashion. The second issue, spring/summer 2012, is now out and highlights include a cover illustration by Ettore Sottsass, a look at the work of the first MA Fashion graduates from the new Central Saint Martins campus in London, a profile of Alvar Aalto medal-winner architect Paulo David and his work in Madeira, a text by French designer Inga Sempé on the trials and tribulations of working as a designer and much, much more. The price includes £3 for postage.

name: Disegno No.1 - UK delivery FREE
description: Disegno is a biannual magazine covering architecture, design and fashion. The first issue is 208 pages and highlights include: a travelogue of the Japanese Inland Sea by writer Julian Worrall and photographer Iwan Baan who explores the architecture of SANAA and Tadao Ando on the Naoshima, Teshima and Inujima islands; An exclusive interview with the French designers Ronan and Erwan Bouroullec as they prepare for the exhibition Bivouac at Pompidou-Metz; Lunch with Parisian couturier Azzedine Alaïa; An essay on the phenomenon of decay in contemporary architecture and design by Professor David Crowley; Interviews with, among others, designer Martin Szekely, Professor of fashion Helen Storey and engineer and artist Cecil Balmond. The price includes £3 for postage.

The price includes £5 for postage.
